item.title: 美国对俄罗斯能源实施全面制裁后，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于美国对俄罗斯能源业的新一轮制裁威胁到本已趋紧的全球市场的原油供应，石油涨幅扩大，接近三个月高点。【原文：Oil extended gains to trade near a three-month high as fresh wave of US sanctions against Russia’s energy industry threatened to crimp crude supplies in an already-tightening global market.】

item.title: 韩元接近关键心理价位令韩国雪上加霜
item.description: 由于政治风险和经济增长放缓强化了更多降息的理由，韩元在跌至 2009 年以来最低点后可能扩大跌幅。【原文：The South Korean won may extend losses after sliding to the lowest since 2009, as political risks and slowing economic growth reinforce the case for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 英国将为新的人工智能数据中心计划探索核能
item.description: 作为工党政府促进技术发展和人工智能生态系统项目的一部分，英国正在规划用于建设数据中心的特殊区域，并将探索将核能专用于这些地点。【原文：The UK is planning special districts for constructing data centers and will explore dedicating nuclear energy to the sites as part of a Labour government project to boost technology growth and the ecosystem for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国就业形势大好，亚洲股市承压：市场综述
item.description: 周一亚洲股市早盘下跌，因为强劲的美国就业数据导致交易商重新思考美联储的降息之路。【原文：Asian stocks were headed for early declines Monday after strong US jobs data led traders to rethink the path ahead for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 影响天气的拉尼娜现象卷土重来。随着农产品成本上升，全球食品价格再次上涨。对关税的担忧促使贸易商将金属转移到北美仓库。【原文：The weather-influencing La Niña phenomena is making a comeback. Global food prices are rising again as agricultural goods get more costly. And tariff fears are pushing traders to shift metals into North American warehouses.】

item.title: 贝恩与 CC Capital 18 亿美元收购 Insignia 的报价不相上下
item.description: 随着澳大利亚财富管理公司 Insignia Financial Ltd. 的收购活动升温，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）提高了对该公司的出价。【原文：Bain Capital sweetened its bid for Insignia Financial Ltd. as takeover activity heats up for the Australian wealth manager.】

item.title: 强生公司正在探索竞购细胞内治疗技术
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）正在探索收购一家专注于治疗中枢神经系统疾病的生物制药公司 Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc.【原文：Johnson & Johnson is exploring a bid to acquire Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc., a biopharmaceutical company focused on treatments for central nervous system disorders, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 首席财务官应聘者最需要的一件事
item.description:
招聘人员讨论当今所需的关键技能。此外，凯悦酒店的财务总监还谈到了经营酒店而非拥有酒店的财务优势。【原文：

Recruiters discuss the key skills needed today. Plus, Hyatt’s finance chief talks about the financial benefits of operating hotels, not owning them. 

】

item.title: 沃克哈特将抗击超级细菌的新药视为下一个增长动力
item.description: 在印度，抗生素的大量使用使当地居民很容易产生抗菌药耐药性，而 Wockhardt Ltd. 预计其抗击引起肺炎的超级细菌的新药将增加印度的收入。【原文：Wockhardt Ltd. expects a boost to revenue from its new drug to fight pneumonia-causing superbugs in India, where rampant use of antibiotics has made the population vulnerable to antimicrobial resistance.】

item.title: 欧洲最大养老基金因马斯克薪酬问题抛售特斯拉股份
item.description: 欧洲最大的养老基金在第三季度出售了其在特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Europe’s largest pension fund sold its entire €571 million ($585 million) stake in Tesla Inc. in the third quarter partly due to disagreement with Elon Musk’s remuneration package.】

item.title: 全球债券暴跌是令人揪心和担忧的新年伊始
item.description:
美国国债市场正在引领借贷成本重启，并可能带来广泛影响。【原文：

The US Treasury market is leading a reset higher in borrowing costs, with potentially wide-ranging consequences.

】

item.title: 特鲁多称若特朗普发动贸易战，加拿大已准备好反制关税
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现其在北美发动贸易战的威胁，加拿大准备好对美国采取反关税措施。【原文：Justin Trudeau says Canada is ready to respond with counter-tariffs against the US if President-elect Donald Trump follows through on his threat to begin a trade war in North America.】

item.title: 英镑交易员已准备好在市场疲软后再次暴跌 8
item.description: 由于财政问题导致英国市场上周出现了令人痛苦的大跌，期权市场的交易员们正准备让英镑再跌 8%。【原文：Traders in the options market are preparing for the pound to tumble as much as 8% more as fiscal woes that prompted a painful selloff across UK markets last week weigh on the currency.】

item.title: 戴蒙称关税有助于解决竞争和安全问题
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）说，关税如果使用得当，有助于解决不公平竞争和国家安全等问题。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Jamie Dimon said that tariffs, if properly used, can help resolve issues such as unfair competition and national security.】

item.title: 贝莱德在银行股权问题上面临美国监管机构新的最后期限
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正面临美国最高监管机构对其银行股权的新要求，此前该资产管理公司未能在1月份的最后期限前完成任务，并推动将谈判推迟到特朗普政府。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is facing a new demand from a top US regulator over its stakes in banks after the asset manager failed to meet a January deadline and pushed to delay talks into the Trump administration.】

item.title: ASML 支持的荷兰大学在网络攻击后停课
item.description: 芯片设备制造商 ASML 控股公司（ASML Holding NV）的重要人才输送基地--荷兰一所顶尖技术大学在遭受网络攻击后关闭了计算机网络。【原文：A top Dutch technical university that’s a key talent feeder for chip machine maker ASML Holding NV has shut down its computer network after a cyber attack.】

item.title: 加纳马哈马为节约成本撤销七个政府部委
item.description: 加纳总统约翰-马哈马（John Mahama）在一封电子邮件声明中说，作为国际货币基金组织紧缩计划下节约成本措施的一部分，加纳总统已经撤销了七个政府部委。【原文：Ghana’s President John Mahama has scrapped seven government ministries as part of a cost-saving measure under the International Monetary Fund’s austerity program, the president said in an e-mailed statement.】

item.title: 私立医院所有者 Prospect Medical 申请破产
item.description: Prospect Medical Holdings Inc. 曾是资金短缺医院的积极买家，在债务堆积和成本飙升的困境下申请破产。【原文：Prospect Medical Holdings Inc., once an active buyer of cash-strapped hospitals, filed for bankruptcy after struggling with debt piles and soaring costs.】

item.title: 大风持续，洛杉矶野火灾情几乎没有缓解
item.description: 干燥的热风将使洛杉矶的大火蔓延至本周中旬，而且一些预测显示，本月余下时间的情况也不会有所缓解。【原文：Dry, hot winds will fan blazes in Los Angeles into midweek — and some forecasts show little relief for the rest of the month — as Southern California struggles with one of the worst starts to a year for wildfires.】

item.title: 财政政策滞后，新兴市场货币任由央行摆布
item.description: 新兴市场的中央银行正在成为保护受到投机性攻击和财政短缺打击的本币的第一道防线。【原文：Emerging-market central banks are becoming the first line of defense to shield local currencies pummeled by speculative attacks and fiscal shortfalls.】

item.title: 迪拜房地产业举世瞩目的涨势显露疲态
item.description: 今年，随着开发商扎堆进入世界上最大的房地产繁荣期之一，迪拜将再次涌现出闪亮的新塔楼和别墅社区。然而，越来越多的迹象表明，创纪录的房价涨势正在放缓。【原文：Shiny new towers and villa communities will again spring up in Dubai this year as developers pile into one of the world’s biggest property booms. Yet there are growing signs that the record rally in prices is slowing.】

item.title: 苹果公司的 2025 计划：iPhone 大改、智能家居推进和人工智能赶超
item.description: 苹果公司计划在 2025 年大干一场，计划对 iPhone 产品线进行全面改造，推出新的人工智能功能，推动智能家居发展，并更新很久没有更新的产品。还有：公司最新的首席财务官上任；迈阿密和中国的新店即将开张；戴尔无耻地复制苹果的玩法，对 PC 进行重大品牌重塑。【原文：Apple plans a loaded 2025, with plans for an overhauled iPhone line, new AI features, a smart home push and updates to products it hasn’t refreshed in a while. Also: The company’s latest CFO takes the job; new stores in Miami and China are opening; and Dell shamelessly copies Apple’s playbook in major PC rebrand.】

item.title: S&P 的 18 万亿美元涨势受到 5% 收益率心理的威胁
item.description: 多年来，似乎没有什么能阻挡股市势不可挡的上涨步伐，因为从 2023 年初到 2024 年末，S&P 500 指数飙升了 50%以上，在此过程中，股市价值增加了 18 万亿美元。然而现在，华尔街看到了可能最终破坏这一涨势的因素：国债收益率超过 5%。【原文：For years it’s seemed like nothing could stop the stock market’s inexorable march higher, as the S&P 500 Index soared more than 50% from the start of 2023 to the end of 2024, adding $18 trillion in value in the process. Now, however, Wall Street is seeing what can ultimately derail this rally: Treasury yields above 5%.】

item.title: 伊朗通讯社报道：伊朗将利用军舰和隐形无人机扩充舰队
item.description: 据国营的伊斯兰共和国通讯社援引陆军协调副司令哈比卜拉-赛亚里（Habibollah Sayyari）少将的话报道，伊朗将在未来几天内接收一艘新战舰和一支先进的无人机舰队。【原文：Iran is set to receive a new warship and a fleet of advanced drones in the coming days, the state-run Islamic Republic News Agency reported, citing the Army’s coordinating deputy, Rear Admiral Habibollah Sayyari.】

item.title: 邮件称津巴布韦支持 ZiG 的储备金增至 5.33 亿美元
item.description: 据《星期日邮报》援引津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡（John Mushayavanhu）的话报道，受去年创纪录的黄金产量推动，截至 1 月 9 日，津巴布韦支持 ZiG 的储备已增至 5.33 亿美元。【原文：Zimbabwe’s reserves backing the ZiG rose to $533 million as of Jan. 9, boosted by last year’s record gold production, the Sunday Mail newspaper reported, citing central bank Governor John Mushayavanhu.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称 Point72 计划向客户返还高达 50 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司在获得巨额利润后，将向投资者返还 30 亿至 50 亿美元。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management will return between $3 billion and $5 billion to investors after posting large profits, according to a report in the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 益普索民调显示马克龙支持率降至六年新低
item.description: 根据益普索（Ipsos）为《每日论坛报》（La Tribune Dimanche）所做的民意调查，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的支持率持续下降，并创下六年来的新低。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron’s approval rating continues to decline and has hit a six-year low, according to a poll by Ipsos for La Tribune Dimanche newspaper.】

item.title: 作为外汇来源，冈比亚的汇款与旅游业不相上下
item.description: 据冈比亚中央银行行长称，去年冈比亚收到的海外工人汇款大幅增加，在经济外汇来源方面已可与旅游业相媲美。【原文：Gambia received a significant increase in remittances from overseas workers last year, rivalling tourism as a source of foreign exchange for the economy, according to the country’s central bank governor.】

item.title: 华尔街银行逆市反弹面临盈利考验

item.title: 遇险油轮被拖至德国吕根岛附近的安全地带
item.description: 一艘悬挂巴拿马国旗的油轮上周在波罗的海失去动力，当局表示，这艘油轮已被拖到德国吕根岛附近的安全地带。【原文：An oil tanker sailing under the Panamanian flag that ran out of power in the Baltic Sea last week has been towed to safety off the German island of Ruegen, authorities said.】
